Package src

Class Order

java.lang.Object
src.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order made for each table in the restaurant. An order must have a item in the menu, a staff and a table. An order may have a set package.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<src.MenuItems>
    customerOrder
    List of item/set packages on this order.

  • Field Details

    • customerOrder

      public ArrayList<src.MenuItems> customerOrder
      List of item/set packages on this order.

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order()
      Creates and initialize a new empty order.

    • Order

      public Order​(int orderID, String staffID, int tableNumber, Timestamp timestamp, float totalPrice, ArrayList<src.MenuItems> customerOrder)
      Creates a new order by staff for the customer with details.
      Parameters:
      orderID - This Order's ID Should not be changed once set.
      staffID - This Order's assigned staff.
      tableNumber - This Order's assigned table number. Should not be changed once assigned.
      timestamp - This Order's start time.
      totalPrice - This Order's total price. This is constantly updated when item/set package is added or removed.
      customerOrder - This Order's list of item/set package.

  • Method Details

    • printOrder

      public void printOrder()
      Prints the item/set package in this order.

    • viewInvoiceOrder

      public void viewInvoiceOrder()
      Gets the invoice of this order.

    • printInvoice

      public void printInvoice()
      Prints the invoice for this order for the customer. This should be printed at check out to show customer item ordered and the total price payable.

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu()
      Prints the item, price and description in the menu for the customer to order for this order.

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder​(String ItemID, int quantity)
      Adds an item with specific quantity for this order.
      Parameters:
      ItemID - This Order's new item added.
      quantity - This Order's quantity of the new item added.

    • removeFromOrder

      public void removeFromOrder​(int orderNumber)
      Removes an item from this order.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - This Order's ID of the item to be removed.

      Gets the order ID for this order.
      Returns:
      This Order's order ID Should not be changed once set.

      Gets the time for this order.

      public void setStaff()
      Assign an available staff to serve this order.

    • validatecustomerPax

      public boolean validatecustomerPax​(int customerPax)
      Checks if the number of customer for this order is within the acceptable range.
      Parameters:
      customerPax - This Order's number of customer.
      Returns:
      True for within the acceptable range. False for not within the acceptable range.

    • setStaff

      public void setStaff​(String StaffID)
      Changes the staff serving this order.
      Parameters:
      StaffID - This Order's staff ID.

    • getStaff

      public String getStaff()
      Gets the ID of the staff serving this order.
      Returns:
      This Order's staff ID.

    • FindTable

      public int FindTable​(int customerPax)
      Finds a available table for this order. This order can only be created if there is an empty table.
      Parameters:
      customerPax - This Order's number of customer.
      Returns:
      Table number if a table is found and 0 if no table is found.

    • getTable

      public int getTable()
      Gets the table number for this order.
      Returns:
      This Order's assigned table number.

    • getOrdersList

      public ArrayList<src.MenuItems> getOrdersList()
      Gets the list of item in this order.
      Returns:
      This Order's list of item.

    • getDateTime

      public Timestamp getDateTime()
      Gets the date and time for this order.
      Returns:
      This order's date and time.

    • getTotalprice

      public float getTotalprice()
      Gets the total price for this order. Subject to change when item is added or removed and when the price of item changed.
      Returns:
      This Order's total price.
